title: The Blue Madonna
credit_line: A. W. Mellon Acquisition Endowment Fund, Paintings Acquisition Fund, George H. Taber Fund, Howard A. Noble Fund, Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell Fund and with gifts from Mrs. George L. Craig, Jr., Mrs. Frank R. Denton, and Mrs. John Berdan
provenance_text: The artist's daughter, Mary Brush Pierce (Mrs. Grenville Clark), Hanover, NH; her daughter, Grace Pierce Forbes, Cambridge, MA, 1970; A.W. Mellon Acquisition Endowment Fund, Paintings Acquisition Fund, George H. Taber Fund, Howard A. Noble Fund, Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell Fund, Mrs. George L. Craig, Jr., Mrs. Frank R. Denton, and Mrs. John Berdan, 1981

creator.death_place: Hanover (Grafton county, New Hampshire, United States)
